mapper.select: select d.name categoryName,date_format(o.create_time,'%H') `hour`,cast(count(1) as CHAR) `count` from business b,orders o,dic d where b.id=o.business_id and b.category=d.code and date_format(o.create_time,'%Y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day),'%Y%m%d') group by d.name,date_format(o.create_time,'%H')
